# Karnataka Hardball Premier League (KHPL) React App

This project is a responsive React application for the Karnataka Hardball Premier League, a premier hardball cricket league in Karnataka, India.

## Project Features
- Responsive design using Bootstrap
- KHPL branding and information
- Registration promotion
- Social media integration
- Mobile-optimized layout
- Real-time registration sheet
- Excel export functionality

## Development Guidelines
- Use React functional components with hooks
- Implement responsive design with Bootstrap 5
- Follow modern JavaScript/React best practices
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Optimize for mobile devices

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - React components
- `/src/assets` - Images and static assets
- `/src/styles` - CSS and styling files
- `/public` - Public assets and HTML template

## Key Components
- Header with KHPL branding
- Hero section with league information
- Registration call-to-action with modal
- Live registration sheet
- Admin panel
- Social media links
- Footer
